about_the_game: Proudly display the colours of San Pelícano's fire department when you're out saving lives. This set includes exclusive cosmetic items for your ambulance, paramedic and all your medical equipment.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game depicts blood, gore and graphic injuries.
In some cases, breasts can be seen.
